pageContext.claim: “We've created 700,000 manufacturing jobs, which we were told by past administrations -- but one, in particular -- that you would never have manufacturing jobs.”
pageContext.analysis: Fewer than 500,000 manufacturing jobs had been added during the Trump administration by the time of these remarks. Trump frequently misquotes Barack Obama, who once said some manufacturing jobs could come back to the country while others would never return because of technological advances and other factors. Trump flattens that quote and erroneously says Obama ruled out all further growth in manufacturing.
